strategy: Cadian Shock Troops armies have a stratergy rating of 2.
initiative: All formations have a initiative rating of 2+. All Imerial Titans have an initiative rating 1+.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Cadian Storm Trooper Regiment

formations.name: 0–1 Regimental HQ
formations.units: One Supreme Commander unit, seven Kasrkin units, and a Leviathan Mobile Command Center.

formations.name: Whiteshield Company (Stormlords)
formations.units: One Commander unit, 12 Whiteshield units and 2 Stormlord.

formations.name: Whiteshield Company (Crassus Amoured Assault)
formations.units: One Commander unit, 12 Whiteshield units and 3 Crassus Amoured Assault Vehicles.

sections.name: Support Formations
sections.description: Up to a Two Support Formations for each Core Formation.

formations.name: Medusa Battery
upgrades: May add gun emplacements for +25 points

formations.name: Flak Battery
upgrades: May add gun emplacements for +25 points

formations.name: Super-heavy Tank Platoon
formations.units: One Baneblade, Shadowsword, Stormsword or Stormblade

formations.name: Karskin Company
formations.units: Seven Kaskin units and 1 Commander unit and either 1 Storm Lord OR 2 Crassus Amoured Assault Vehicles

sections.name: Imperial Titans
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on Heavy Support, Aircraft and Spacecraft

formations.name: Warhound Pack
upgrades: Warhound pack gains the 'Independent' special rule for +50 points.

sections.name: Cadian Aircraft, Spacecraft
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on Imperial Titans, Aircraft and Spacecraft

formations.name: 0–1 Orbital Support
upgrades: Replace with Emperor Class Battleship for +50 points
